text: Alatala to falan ti fɔlɔ Hose xa, a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Sa ɲaxalan yalunxina nde tongo, i dii yalunxine sɔtɔ, amasɔtɔ yamaan yalunyaan nan ligama, e Alatala rabeɲin!”1.2 Muxun na suxurene batu e nun Ala, na luxi alo niin gbee yalunyaan na a ra. Ala xɔlɔma na kanna ma alo xɛmɛn xɔlɔma a ɲaxanla ma kii naxan yi, xa a bira xɛmɛ gbɛtɛ fɔxɔ ra.
